channel.title: Making Premium Teleports
channel.description: I need to know how to make teleports premium only. Any one know how? Thanks.

item.title: Making Premium Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“nobiwa666, post:5, topic:294890”]you need alot more.
you need to declare premium.
you need to let it save and load.
just like the player rights.
and you need to got something in the code fro tele.[/quote]

wouldn’t you need a case for the tele?

like…

[code] case (teleport id)

  } else if (prem > 0) {

if (npcID == 2244) { // lumby guide
teleportToX = YourCoordX;// might be diff on your source
teleportToY = YourCoordY;// might be diff on your source
sendMessage(“Welcome to prem zone!”); // might be like sM on your source.
} else {
sendMessage(“Go away”);
}

/*
this one is for npc’s not teleports
*/[/code]

or am i wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Making Premium Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

public int prem = 0;

} else if (prem > 0) {
if (npcID == 2244) { // lumby guide
teleportToX = YourCoordX;// might be diff on your source
teleportToY = YourCoordY;// might be diff on your source
sendMessage("Welcome to prem zone!"); // might be like sM on your source.
} else {
sendMessage("Go away");
}

/*
   this one is for npc's not teleports
*/

Read full topic

item.title: Making Premium Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

if(premium == false){ sendMessage("You need to be premium to use this teleport."); } else { if(premium == true){ teleportToX = 301234021042103501230502315012305; teleportToY = 214021035102305235012359090235902; }

Read full topic
